TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Utf8JsonReader extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供高性能的 API，以便提供对 UTF-8 编码 JSON 文本的只进和只读访问权限。

span.span: Provides a high-performance API for forward-only, read-only access to the UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Utf8JsonReader` 进程的文本按顺序不使用缓存并默认情况下为严格遵循[JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259)。`Utf8JsonReader` processes the text sequentially with no caching and by default adheres strictly to the [JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259). 当`Utf8JsonReader`遇到无效的 JSON，则会引发与行数和字节位置如下基本错误信息： 在行上。When `Utf8JsonReader` encounters invalid JSON, it throws a with basic error information like line number and byte position on the line. 由于此类型是 ref 结构，它不直接支持异步。Since this type is a ref struct, it doesn't directly support async. 但是，它提供对以读取不完整的数据并提供更多的数据后，请继续阅读可重入性的支持。However, it does provide support for reentrancy to read incomplete data and to continue reading once more data is presented. 若要能够设置读取时的最大深度或允许跳过注释，创建的实例并将它传递给读取器。To be able to set max depth while reading OR allow skipping comments, create an instance of and pass it to the reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此类型是 ref 结构，它是仅限堆栈的类型，并向其应用的 ref 结构的所有限制。Since this type is a ref struct, it is a stack-only type, and all the limitations of ref structs apply to it. 这是为什么构造函数接受的原因。This is the reason why the constructor accepts a .

The depth of the current token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CurrentDepth`属性跟踪嵌套对象的递归深度 / 为止处理的 JSON 文本中的数组。The `CurrentDepth` property tracks the recursive depth of the nested objects / arrays within the JSON text processed so far.

summary.span: 获取 状态的当前快照，该状态必须由调用方捕获并传递回包含更多数据的 构造函数。

span.span: Gets the current snapshot of the state that must be captured by the caller and passed back in to the constructor with more data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同、 这是 ref 结构、 状态可以经受得住跨异步/等待边界和因此需要此类型提供支持的更多数据然后再继续进行的新实例以异步方式读取。Unlike the , which is a ref struct, the state can survive across async/await boundaries, and hence this type is required to provide support for reading in more data asynchronously before continuing with a new instance of the .

Member.Docs:
从源中读取下一个 JSON 令牌值，并作为 进行反转义和转码。Reads the next JSON token value from the source, unescaped, and transcoded as a . 解析为 的令牌。The token value parsed to a . To be added. JSON 令牌值不是字符串（即，不是 或 ）。The JSON token value isn't a string (that is, not a or ).
-or-
The JSON string contains invalid UTF-8 bytes or invalid UTF-16 surrogates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasValueSequence As Boolean
public: property bool HasValueSequence { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取值，该值指示要使用哪个 Value 属性来获取令牌值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates which Value property to use to get the token value.

value.span: 如果应该用于获取令牌的值。

span.span: if should be used to get the token value.
if should be used instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`HasValueSequence`是`false`，为空。If `HasValueSequence` is `false`, is empty. 因此，令牌值使用读取属性。Therefore, read the token value using the property. 中的输入数据`ReadOnlySpan`，则此始终返回`false`。For input data within a `ReadOnlySpan`, this always returns `false`. 中的输入数据`ReadOnlySequence`，这会仅返回`true`令牌值跨多个以上的单个细分，并因此不能表示为一个范围。For input data within a `ReadOnlySequence`, this only returns `true` if the token value straddles more than a single segment and hence can't be represented as a span.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValueSequence As ReadOnlySequence(Of Byte)

summary.span: 获取最后一个处理的令牌的值作为输入有效负载的 ReadOnlySpan<byte> 切片。

span.span: Gets the value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySpan<byte> slice of the input payload.

summary.span: 如果在 ReadOnlySequence<byte> 内提供 JSON，并且表示令牌值的切片适合单个段，则 包含切分的值，因为它可以表示为一个范围。

span.span: If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span.

summary.span: 否则 包含令牌值。

span.span: Otherwise, contains the token value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`false`，`ValueSequence`为空。If is `false`, `ValueSequence` is empty. 因此，只能访问`ValueSequence`如果是`true`。Therefore, only access `ValueSequence` if is `true`. 否则，必须从访问令牌值。Otherwise, the token value must be accessed from .

summary.span: 否则 包含令牌值。

span.span: Otherwise, the contains the token value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，为空。If is `true`, is empty. 因此，只能访问`ValueSpan`如果是`false`。Therefore, only access `ValueSpan` if is `false`. 否则，必须从访问令牌值。Otherwise, the token value must be accessed from .
